projects.name: ASL-to-Text
projects.desc: A simple ASL alphabet transcription app written in Python using the Leap Motion Device for input

projects.name: Dinner Wizard
projects.desc: Interactive meal suggestion app written using AngularJS. Takes a set of ingredients and suggests edible combinations of ingredient subsets given a number of additional parameters

projects.name: Those Darn Dastardly Dragon Attacks!
projects.desc: A small, turn-based, castle management and defense text-based game in C++

projects.name: Tiles
projects.desc: Little tile puzzles using HTML5 Canvas

projects.name: Tile Editor
projects.desc: Facilitates puzzle creation for Tiles in multiple canvas sizes and displays JSON on page. Best on larger screens.

projects.name: News Reader
projects.desc: A small news reader to get familiar with ngResource and iframes

projects.name: XML to JSON
projects.desc: An XML to JSON converter written in C++ as an exercise to better understand the use of state machines, text parsing and tree structures

projects.name: Colors
projects.desc: Uses HTML5 Canvas to approximate something similar to a simplified MS Paint

projects.name: Polygon Circle Approximation
projects.desc: Uses HTML5 Canvas to construct circle approximations from an arbitrary number of line segments

projects.name: SVG Basic Projections
projects.desc: Top, Front and Side views of a house with some customizable colors

projects.name: SVG More Projections
projects.desc: (from top left) Front, Side, 3-point Projection,  2-point Projection, 1-point Projection (from bottom left) Top, Isometric Projection, Trimetric Projection, Dimetric Projection, Oblique Projection

projects.name: First Try of Three.js
projects.desc: An experiment with Three.js and materials. (from left) Reflective cube, die with texture and bump map, die with bump map only
